title: Education Support Program
description:
Our flagship Education Support Program provides free educational resources, tutoring, and school supplies to underprivileged children in rural communities. Through partnerships with local schools and dedicated volunteers, we ensure that every child has access to quality education regardless of their economic background.

The program covers primary and secondary education support, including textbooks, stationery, uniforms, and after-school tutoring sessions. We also conduct regular workshops for parents to help them understand the importance of education and how they can support their children's learning at home.
impactPoints: Over 200 students supported with educational materials annually
15 local schools partnered for after-school tutoring programs
95% of supported students showed improved academic performance
30 dedicated volunteers serving across multiple communities
